Title: Adnoc, Mitsui seal 15-year deal for 0.6 mtpa of LNG from Ruwais LNG
Description: UAE's Adnoc has signed a 15-year sales and purchase agreement with Japan’s trading house Mitsui & Co for the supply of 0.6 mtpa of LNG from Adnoc’s 9.6 mtpa Ruwais LNG export facility in Al Ruwais.
Author: JS

Title: Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG completes loading of first full cargo, sailaway imminent
Description: The BP-led Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG project offshore Mauritania and Senegal has completed loading its first full cargo, with the vessel expected to sail imminently, marking the start of LNG exports from both countries.
Author: CK

Title: Woodside Energy appoints former Mexico Pacific CEO to join proposed Louisiana LNG project
Description: Australian independent Woodside Energy has appointed the former Chief Executive of LNG project developer Mexico Pacific, Sarah Bairstow, as Senior Vice President for its proposed Louisiana LNG development in the US.
Author: CK

Title: Kogas seeks LNG cargoes for delivery from June 2025 to March 2026
Description: South Korea’s Kogas has issued a tender to buy an undisclosed number of LNG cargoes for delivery from June through March 2026, covering both the upcoming summer and winter seasons. The tender closes on Apr. 17.
Author: CK

Title: Argentina’s Enarsa fully awards eight-cargo June–July LNG tender; BP seen as likely sole winner
Description: Argentina’s state-owned Energía Argentina, or Enarsa, has fully awarded its recently closed tender for eight LNG cargoes to be delivered between June and early July to its 6.1 mtpa Escobar terminal, according to market participants. The award brings Enarsa’s total winter season purchases so far to 14 cargoes.
Author: CK

Title: Ichthys LNG seeks May cargo for Taiwan amid production drop
Description: The Inpex-led Ichthys LNG project has issued a tender for a single LNG cargo for mid-May delivery to Taiwan, in what market sources say is a move likely to cover a shortfall in output at the 8.9 mtpa facility in Australia’s Northern Territory. The tender closes today.
Author: CK
